achievements.name: California Dreamin'
achievements.description: Discover at least 15 cities in California

achievements.name: Sea Dog
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to a port in Oakland and a port in San Francisco

achievements.name: Cheers!
achievements.description: Deliver cargo from at least 3 vineyards in California

achievements.name: Warming Up
achievements.description: Drive 10,000 miles during deliveries

achievements.name: Rig Master
achievements.description: Buy your own truck

achievements.name: Company Collector
achievements.description: Perform deliveries for at least 15 different companies

achievements.name: High Five
achievements.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 600 miles

achievements.name: Cha-Ching
achievements.description: Earn $100,000 delivering cargos

achievements.name: Final Makeover
achievements.description: Fully upgrade one of your garages

achievements.name: Not a Problem
achievements.description: Successfully park a trailer at a delivery point

achievements.name: Like a Boss
achievements.description: Successfully park a trailer at a hard delivery point

achievements.name: I Think I Like It
achievements.description: Finish 50 deliveries

achievements.name: Pimp My Truck
achievements.description: Buy, design and apply a custom paintjob

achievements.name: What's Your BMI?
achievements.description: Use a weigh station

achievements.name: Gas Guzzler
achievements.description: Use a gas station

achievements.name: Silver State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Nevada

achievements.name: Gold Fever
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to at least 1 quarry in Nevada

achievements.name: Copper State
achievements.description: Discover at least 12 cities in Arizona

achievements.name: Sky Harbor
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to the Phoenix Airport

achievements.name: Start Your Engine!
achievements.description: Get on the start of the Truck Racing circuit

achievements.name: Powell's Trail
achievements.description: Visit at least 4 Colorado River sights

achievements.name: Time for Big Hauling
achievements.description: Deliver first Heavy Cargo Pack job (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

achievements.name: How Heavy Am I?!
achievements.description: Use truck scale or weigh station with gross vehicle weight of at least 175,000 lbs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

achievements.name: Heavy, but Not Bull in a China Shop!
achievements.description: Complete excellent delivery of a cargo from the Heavy Cargo Pack which is at least 1,000 miles long (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

achievements.name: Bigger Cargo, Bigger Profit
achievements.description: Earn $100,000 on 5 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

achievements.name: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
achievements.description: Complete a delivery of at least 8 unique cargoes from the Heavy Cargo Pack (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

achievements.name: The Land of Enchantment
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in New Mexico (requires New Mexico DLC)

achievements.name: Truck Stop Tour
achievements.description: Visit at least 18 large truck stops and rest stops in New Mexico (requires New Mexico DLC)

achievements.name: Forest Shortcut
achievements.description: Discover shortcut through the forest (requires New Mexico DLC)
Drive by the Billy The Kid Museum (requires New Mexico DLC)

achievements.name: Sky Delivery
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to An-124 depot (requires New Mexico DLC)

achievements.name: Size Matters
achievements.description: Successfully deliver a Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: Go Big or Go Home
achievements.description: Complete deliveries on at least 10 oversize routes in base game (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: Get (to) the Chopper!
achievements.description: Successfully deliver a Helicopter Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: One, Two, Three - Breathe!
achievements.description: Successfully deliver an Air Conditioning Complex Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: Big in America!
achievements.description: Complete at least 10 unique deliveries of oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: Your Dumper Has Arrived!
achievements.description: Deliver all three parts of a disassembled dumper: Haul Truck Hull, Huge Tyres, Haul Truck Chassis (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: Home Sweet Home
achievements.description: Successfully deliver a Turnkey House Special Transport DLC mission with no damage and on time (requires Special Transport DLC)

achievements.name: The Beaver State
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Oregon (requires Oregon DLC)

achievements.name: Uplifting
achievements.description: Travel across the New Youngs Bay Bridge (requires Oregon DLC)

achievements.name: Lumberjack
achievements.description: Deliver cargo from at least 4 timber harvest sites in Oregon (requires Oregon DLC)

achievements.name: Travel Oregon
achievements.description: Discover following landmarks of Oregon: Crater Lake, Crooked River Gorge, Thor's Well and Yaquina Head Lighthouse (requires Oregon DLC)

achievements.name: Cabbage to Cabbage
achievements.description: Complete a delivery of vegetables over Cabbage Hill (requires Oregon DLC)

achievements.name: The Evergreen State
achievements.description: Discover at least 12 cities in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Steel Wings
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to an aerospace company in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Keep Sailing
achievements.description: Deliver a boat to a marina in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Terminal Terminus
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to at least 1 port terminal in Washington (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Seattle Mole
achievements.description: Drive through both Seattle tunnels (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Ferry Tales
achievements.description: Use a ferry to cross the water (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Over the Top
achievements.description: Drive through the forest road to timber harvest in Bellingham (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Travel Washington
achievements.description: Visit Mount St. Helens, Grand Coulee Dam, Mount Rainier (requires Washington DLC)

achievements.name: Logged-In
achievements.description: Complete delivery of at least 4 Forest Machinery DLC cargoes (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

achievements.name: Leave No Branch Behind!
achievements.description: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of at least 3 Forest Machinery DLC jobs (requires Forest Machinery DLC)

achievements.name: Beehive State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

achievements.name: This One Is Mine!
achievements.description: Visit at least 2 mines and quarries in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

achievements.name: It's Something
achievements.description: Find a sign that says "nothing" (requires Utah DLC)

achievements.name: Some Like It Salty
achievements.description: Take a job from each branch of at least 6 companies located in Salt Lake City (requires Utah DLC)

achievements.name: Pump It Up
achievements.description: Deliver frac tank trailer to at least 5 oil drilling sites in Utah (requires Utah DLC)

achievements.name: Gem State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Idaho (requires Idaho DLC)

achievements.name: Grown in Idaho
achievements.description: Complete five deliveries of potatoes from Idaho farms (requires Idaho DLC)

achievements.name: Along the Snake River
achievements.description: Complete perfect deliveries (no damage, no fines, on time) between the following cities: Kennewick - Lewiston; Boise - Twin Falls; Twin Falls - Pocatello; Pocatello - Idaho Falls. Any order or direction counts (requires Washington and Idaho DLCs)

achievements.name: The Director
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Idaho (requires Idaho DLC)

achievements.name: 45th Parallel
achievements.description: Visit 45th parallel in Idaho - a halfway between the Equator and the North Pole (requires Idaho DLC)

achievements.name: The Centennial State
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Million Dollar Highway
achievements.description: Drive along this famously scenic and thrilling section of the U.S. 550 in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Cruising High Below
achievements.description: Drive through the Eisenhower-Johnson Memorial Tunnel, the highest point on the US Interstate Highway System, in both directions (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Energy From Above
achievements.description: Deliver a Tower and Nacelle to at least 1 Vitas Power wind turbine construction site in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Gold Rush
achievements.description: Deliver 10 loads to or from the NAMIQ company at the gold mine in Colorado (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Up and Away
achievements.description: Complete 10 deliveries to Denver Airport (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: Four Corners
achievements.description: Visit the famous Four Corners Monument that marks where the states of Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico, and Utah meet (requires Colorado DLC)

achievements.name: The Equality State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

achievements.name: Over Plains and Mountains
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

achievements.name: Population 1
achievements.description: Discover and visit the town of Buford (requires Wyoming DLC)

achievements.name: Big Boy
achievements.description: Deliver Train Axles, Tamping Machine and Rails to or from the rail yard in Cheyenne (requires Wyoming DLC)

achievements.name: Buffalo Bill
achievements.description: Complete 10 excellent cattle deliveries to livestock auctions in Wyoming (requires Wyoming DLC)

achievements.name: The Last Best Place
achievements.description: Discover at least 12 cities in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

achievements.name: Big Sky Country
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 10 viewpoints in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

achievements.name: Zero Waste
achievements.description: Show your support for zero waste by completing a total of 10 deliveries of the Dumpster Bins and Waste Paper cargoes to the Waste Transfer Stations in Montana, and at least one Garbage Truck cargo to or from anywhere in Montana (requires Montana DLC)

achievements.name: Power On!
achievements.description: Spark up Montana and support the power network by delivering a Circuit Breakers cargo and a Utility Poles cargo to the electric substations in each of the following cities: Butte, Glasgow and Havre (requires Montana DLC)

achievements.name: Major Miner
achievements.description: Complete excellent delivery of any machinery equipment to the Bull Mountains coal mine, Silane from the silane gas factory and Talc Powder from the talc factory (requires Montana DLC)

achievements.name: Parking Challenge
achievements.description: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

achievements.name: The Lone Star State
achievements.description: Discover at least 20 cities in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

achievements.name: Big Country Views
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 25 viewpoints in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

achievements.name: Avid Historian
achievements.description: Discover at least 30 historical markers in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

achievements.name: Shoreside Delivery
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to or from at least 2 shipyards and 4 cargo ports in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

achievements.name: Farm Away
achievements.description: Deliver cargo to or from at least 5 farms and 2 livestock auctions in Texas (requires Texas DLC)

achievements.name: Cotton Bloom
achievements.description: Complete 10 deliveries of at least one Cotton Lint, Cotton Seed and Cotton Harvester within Texas (requires Texas and Heavy Cargo Pack DLCs)

achievements.name: The Sooner State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Oklahoma (requires Oklahoma DLC)

achievements.name: Can Do!
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 6 viewpoints in Oklahoma (requires Oklahoma DLC)

achievements.name: School Bus Capital
achievements.description: Deliver 5 Bus Hood cargoes to and 5 School Bus cargoes from the bus factory in Tulsa (requires Oklahoma DLC)

achievements.name: Big Wheels Keep On Turning
achievements.description: Complete 3 deliveries of Big Tyres cargo from at least 1 tyre factory in Lawton or Ardmore (requires Oklahoma DLC)

achievements.name: The Sunflower State
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

achievements.name: Wheat State Explorer
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 7 viewpoints in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

achievements.name: Air Capital of the World
achievements.description: Deliver an Aircraft Wing and Jet Engine Inlets to or from at least 2 aviation depots in Wichita (requires Kansas DLC)

achievements.name: Can you Keep a Secret?
achievements.description: Discover at least 3 unmarked roads in Kansas (requires Kansas DLC)

achievements.name: Grain of Salt
achievements.description: Complete 6 deliveries from the Hutchinson Salt Mine in Kansas. At least 2 deliveries must be to a Food Factory (requires Kansas DLC)

achievements.name: Cornhusker State
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

achievements.name: Nebraska Explorer
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 6 viewpoints in Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

achievements.name: Vehicle Dealer
achievements.description: Complete 3 deliveries from the Utility Vehicle Factory in Lincoln to RV dealers in Omaha, Norfolk, and Columbus (requires Nebraska DLC)

achievements.name: Agriculture Expert
achievements.description: Complete one delivery of corn, grain, potatoes and soybean from or within Nebraska (requires Nebraska DLC)

achievements.name: The Natural State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

achievements.name: I Saw Arkansas
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

achievements.name: Paper Trail
achievements.description: Complete 3 deliveries of Logs to Chuck & Jack's, and 3 deliveries of Wood Shavings to Page & Price Paper, within Arkansas (requires Arkansas DLC)

achievements.name: Spa City
achievements.description: Complete a delivery to 5 different companies in Hot Springs (requires Arkansas DLC)

achievements.name: Get the Ball Rollin'
achievements.description: Complete the first scenario of the first chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Professional Driver
achievements.description: Complete at least 6 scenarios in the fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics while using only the interior camera (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Dedicated Student
achievements.description: Complete at least 28 scenarios in Truck Driving Basics including the final exams (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: One-Shottin' It
achievements.description: Complete any scenario in fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics in one attempt without correcting by driving forward (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Rowing Through the Gears
achievements.description: Complete 20 scenarios in chapters two, three or four of Truck Driving Basics using an H-shifter or sequential transmission (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Failure Is Not an Option
achievements.description: Complete any 5 scenarios in a row without failure from the third or fourth chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Show-Me State!
achievements.description: Discover at least 10 cities in Missouri (requires Missouri DLC)

achievements.name: Ozark Explorer
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 12 viewpoints in Missouri (requires Missouri DLC)

achievements.name: Subterranean
achievements.description: Complete a delivery to at least 2 underground Terrastore warehouses (requires Missouri DLC)

achievements.name: What a Blast!
achievements.description: Deliver ammonia and sulphuric acid to Namiq in Joplin, then complete a dynamite delivery from it (requires Missouri DLC)

achievements.name: Advanced Student
achievements.description: Complete the pass conditions in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Nerd of the Road
achievements.description: Obtain 3 stars in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: Shining Star
achievements.description: Obtain 3 stars in any 3 scenarios played in a row in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

achievements.name: The Hawkeye State
achievements.description: Discover at least 8 cities in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

achievements.name: Golden Acres Explorer
achievements.description: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

achievements.name: Madison County Bridge
achievements.description: Cross the iconic bridge in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)

achievements.name: Piggy Express
achievements.description: Complete a live pigs cargo delivery from two livestock farms in Iowa (requires Iowa DLC)
